metadata.Title: CVE-2015-4053 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: The admin command in ceph-deploy before 1.5.25 uses world-readable permissions for /etc/ceph/ceph.client.admin.keyring, which allows local users to obtain sensitive information by reading the file.

criterions.comment: ceph-deploy: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
